issue.title: [Rust]: Unify common methods of dictionaries and other array types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10335](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10335). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, we have a differently named set of methods which do the same thing underneath but written inside the concrete implementations of Arrays. One example is append_value in DictionaryArray. Unify these methods with primitive arrays to prevent passing around dynamic objects.
